title: Fully furnished 4 bed room 2 bath room apt. South Boston
posting_body: A fully furnished big apt with 4 bed rooms, 2 bath room is conveniently located at a quiet and safety neighborhood near Broadway redline T in South boston, 10 minutes walk to redline T and 2 minutes to No.9 bus station.
Walking 5 min, to grocery store and minutes walk to west broad way tremendous restaurants, pubs, coffees, gyms, banks and stores.
Walking 10 min.
to conventional center.
Walking to Boston Harbor, Downtown, beach, Seaport, China town.
There are tremendous restaurants, pubs and stores nearby.
It is also convenient to go to south station, airport, MGH, MIT, Harvard etc by taking T.
This is a two floor duplex, there are two bed rooms, one bath at lower floor, and two bed rooms one bath at upper floor.
Dish washer, Laundry room inside apt.
central AC and central heating system, hardwood floor through entire apt.
Very nice lay out, fully furnished, clean, quiet, comfortable and convenient.
It has everything needed, all you need to do is to bring your suitcase.
No pets.
No smoke.
No party.
Easy free parking.
Year lease.
Please feel free to text me at 6178066586 if interested.
Sorry I don't pick up strange number phone calls only text please.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers.
Thanks.
